title: Low Privileged Staff Member Can Export Billing Charges

profile.name: Shopify
profile.about: Shopify is a multi-channel commerce platform that helps people sell online, in-store, and everywhere in between.

summaries.content: @ash_nz reported an issue where a staff member without explicit permissions on a shop would be able to export a limited summary of charges made to that shop's billing account by Shopify and Shopify apps.
